Welcome to bisa’s documentation!¶

Welcome to bisa’s documentation! This documentation is intended to be a guide for learning bisa, as well as a reference for the API. If you’re new to bisa,

The bisa team maintains a number of libraries that are used as part of bisa. These libraries are:

  • archinfo - Information about CPU architectures

  • pyvex - Python bindings to the VEX IR

  • pypcode - Python bindings to the Pcode IR

  • ailment - bisa’s high-level intermediate language

  • cle - Many-platform binary loader

  • claripy - Solver abstraction layer

bisa also has a GUI! Check out bisa-management.
